headline: Billionaire Ken Griffin’s 10 Midcap Stock Picks with Huge Upside Potential
summary: Ken Griffin, the founder of Citadel, is an influential albeit controversial figure in the investment industry. Ken Griffin tasted early success while trading during his college days, and it is safe to say that he has never looked back since. Despite huge setbacks during the financial crisis of 2008, he used his skills and determination […]
